https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xPH1ORV9czVN3PU8Oev4xMOL9d7.jpg Three girlfriends, Preenita, Rhea and Shreemoyee share everything with each other from the angst of the "will-he-or-won't-he-call" debates, to the addictive gossip sessions, the analysis of dumping and getting dumped, the complaining about husbands, boyfriends, or the lack of boyfriends; over cups and cups of coffee, as they let their hair down on their 'girls-gone-wild' nights on the town. Ami Aar Amar Girlfriends
